properties.description: Overall requirement depends on specific survey temperature requirements
Overall requirement depends on thermocouple placement requirements
Thermocouple placement depends on proper thermocouple calibration
Initial survey requirement depends on general survey requirements
Periodic survey requirement depends on general survey requirements
SAT frequency requirement depends on SAT methodology requirement
SAT methodology depends on proper equipment calibration
Thermocouple calibration requirement clarifies general equipment calibration requirement
Survey temperature requirement clarifies process parameter requirements
